pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with Prime Minister of Australia Malcolm Turnbull | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met today with the Prime Minister of Australia, Malcolm Turnbull the margins of the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation Leadersâ€™ Meeting.

The two leaders discussed the current status of the Trans-Pacific Partnership discussions and the leaders' mutual interest in deepening regional integration in the Asia-Pacific region based on an open and progressive trade agenda.
